publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-510 Marlyn Glen: Stobswell Pharmacy, Dundee-That the Parliament congratulates the Stobswell Pharmacy, Dundee, after its first successful year as a model for community pharmacies; notes the valuable role that pharmacies play in promoting a healthy style of living, and congratulates all those associated with the pharmacy on their work in promoting health in the local community and promoting the name of Dundee through another new project tested in the city to benefit the rest of Scotland.
S2M-510 Stobswell Pharmacy, Dundee (lodged on 24 October 2003) Shona Robison*
